## Introduction

This document contains SQL queries to explore the `pnw_counties` and `pnw_towns` tables in our SQLite database. (Maybe `fips` too?)

## Setup

```{r}
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), dbname = "pnw_database.sqlite")
